choose:
(:action choose_plant
    :parameters (?p - player ?plant - fir ?loc - garden_center)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (available ?plant ?loc))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?plant) (not (available ?plant ?loc)))
)

(:action choose_soil
    :parameters (?p - player ?soil - soil ?loc - garden_center)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (available ?soil ?loc))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?soil) (not (available ?soil ?loc)))
)

(:action select_container
    :parameters (?p - player ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?container in_cabinet) (empty ?container))
    :effect (and (at ?container on_countertop) (not (at ?container in_cabinet)))
)
plant:
(:action plant_fir
    :parameters (?p - player ?plant - fir ?container - container ?soil - soil)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?plant) (at ?container on_countertop) (inventory ?p ?soil) (not (planted ?plant)))
    :effect (and (planted ?plant ?container) (not (inventory ?p ?plant)) (not (inventory ?p ?soil)))
)
